story.title: CPS Public Hearing: Stagg Elementary AUSL Turnaround
story.description: A hearing for the proposed Reconstitution/Turnaround of Amos Alonzo Stagg Elementary School. The turnaround would be run by AUSL (Academy for Urban School Leadership). Held in the board room of the Chicago Public Schools administration building. Tuesday, January 31st, 2012 8:00 - 10:00 PM

author.name: Josh Kalov
author.bio: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

quote.text: As with the 2 hearings last night and the Herzl hearing earlier, Fredrick Bates is the hearing officer for the Stagg hearing #cps

meta.text: As with the 2 hearings last night and the Herzl hearing earlier, Fredrick Bates is the hearing officer for the Stagg hearing #cps

quote.text: Did ActionNow or other groups come here by bus tonight? #cps

meta.text: Did ActionNow or other groups come here by bus tonight? #cps

quote.text: Looks like a big turnout for the 2nd hearing. (Stagg) #cps

meta.text: Looks like a big turnout for the 2nd hearing. (Stagg) #cps

quote.text: Lots of @ctulocal1 "SAVE STAGG SCHOOL" signs... @ctulocal1 should know better. #cps

meta.text: Lots of @ctulocal1 "SAVE STAGG SCHOOL" signs... @ctulocal1 should know better. #cps

data.text: I said they should know better because they should have known that signs were not allowed in the board room. @ctulocal1 re-collected all the signs.

quote.text: While in the security line earlier, there was an interesting discussion between ActionNow person, @ctulocal1 organizer, & 3rd person #cps

meta.text: While in the security line earlier, there was an interesting discussion between ActionNow person, @ctulocal1 organizer, & 3rd person #cps

quote.text: Definitely seems to be a strong desire to identify any paid protesters/speakers #cps

meta.text: Definitely seems to be a strong desire to identify any paid protesters/speakers #cps

quote.text: In the quest to root out paid protesters, it will be important not to inadvertently harass any innocent people. #cps

meta.text: In the quest to root out paid protesters, it will be important not to inadvertently harass any innocent people. #cps

quote.text: Lots of children here #cps

meta.text: Lots of children here #cps

quote.text: Finally in for the 2nd hearing #cps

meta.text: Finally in for the 2nd hearing #cps

quote.text: It actually looks slightly less crowded for Stagg than it was for Herzl. More young children. #cps

meta.text: It actually looks slightly less crowded for Stagg than it was for Herzl. More young children. #cps

quote.text: I guess with an 8pm hearing it might be hard for parents to come to the hearing if they didn't bring children. #cps

meta.text: I guess with an 8pm hearing it might be hard for parents to come to the hearing if they didn't bring children. #cps

quote.text: Adam Anderson speaking again #cps

meta.text: Adam Anderson speaking again #cps

quote.text: If this hearing follows pattern, public comment should begin in 25-30 minutes #cps

meta.text: If this hearing follows pattern, public comment should begin in 25-30 minutes #cps

quote.text: http://ow.ly/i/reg8 Stagg ISAT scores #cps

meta.text: http://t.co/rNHpVGsv Stagg ISAT scores #cps

quote.text: I know I'm a broken record at this point, but the 45min admin/CEO speakers is inefficient at best, shady if I want to be cynical. #cps

meta.text: I know I'm a broken record at this point, but the 45min admin/CEO speakers is inefficient at best, shady if I want to be cynical. #cps

quote.text: @shua123 "Running out the clock" at public hearings is a time-honored tradition in Chicago politics.

meta.text: @shua123 "Running out the clock" at public hearings is a time-honored tradition in Chicago politics.

quote.text: @shua123 shady, cynical, disgusting #strategy is still #strategy

meta.text: @shua123 shady, cynical, disgusting #strategy is still #strategy

quote.text: Morton principal speaking again as AUSL representative. #cps

meta.text: Morton principal speaking again as AUSL representative. #cps

quote.text: Room is just about full now #cps

meta.text: Room is just about full now #cps

quote.text: Have I tweeted the AUSL performance slide yet? #cps

meta.text: Have I tweeted the AUSL performance slide yet? #cps

quote.text: http://ow.ly/i/rekG AUSL performance slide #cps

meta.text: http://t.co/VJ6pVh9R AUSL performance slide #cps

quote.text: AUSL spiel mentions Common Core standards. Those will be implemented regardless of AUSL turnaround or not though... #cps

meta.text: AUSL spiel mentions Common Core standards. Those will be implemented regardless of AUSL turnaround or not though... #cps

quote.text: AUSL statement finishes just before 8:50pm as expected. Public comment up next. #cps

meta.text: AUSL statement finishes just before 8:50pm as expected. Public comment up next. #cps

quote.text: Tommy Anderson LSC chair- Stagg parent of 4. 1 son doing great in Montessori program at Stagg #cps

meta.text: Tommy Anderson LSC chair- Stagg parent of 4. 1 son doing great in Montessori program at Stagg #cps

quote.text: paraphrased- All this money allocated to the schools but only if accept the turnaround #cps

meta.text: paraphrased- All this money allocated to the schools but only if accept the turnaround #cps

user.description: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.
user.name: Josh Kalov

quote.text: "When I grew up CPS stood for Chicago Public Schools but now its all charters & turnarounds" #cps

meta.text: "When I grew up CPS stood for Chicago Public Schools but now its all charters & turnarounds" #cps

quote.text: "The same money you will give to AUSL teachers you can give to our teachers" #cps

meta.text: "The same money you will give to AUSL teachers you can give to our teachers" #cps

quote.text: Editorial comment/question- Any success/failure stories on Montessori in CPS schools? I've always been intrigued by Montessori #cps

meta.text: Editorial comment/question- Any success/failure stories on Montessori in CPS schools? I've always been intrigued by Montessori #cps

quote.text: HO asked for clarification on what a "community school" is. "Doesn't just benefit kids, benefits our community" #cps

meta.text: HO asked for clarification on what a "community school" is. "Doesn't just benefit kids, benefits our community" #cps

quote.text: "community school" for kids and parents/community #cps

meta.text: "community school" for kids and parents/community #cps

quote.text: Alderman Thomas now. "perplexed at length of time it took for CPS to present case" #cps

meta.text: Alderman Thomas now. "perplexed at length of time it took for CPS to present case" #cps

quote.text: Thomas- speaking out against turnaround. #cps

meta.text: Thomas- speaking out against turnaround. #cps

quote.text: Thomas has called an ed committee hearing on closings for monday RT @shua123 Alderman Latasha Thomas- speaking out against turnaround. #cps

meta.text: Thomas has called an ed committee hearing on closings for monday RT @shua123 Alderman Latasha Thomas- speaking out against turnaround. #cps

quote.text: Thomas- I am opposed to keeping the entire blame on the teachers and school faculty. #cps

meta.text: Thomas- I am opposed to keeping the entire blame on the teachers and school faculty. #cps

quote.text: Thomas: Holistic approach provides best chance for success #cps

meta.text: Thomas: Holistic approach provides best chance for success #cps

quote.text: Thomas- Failing children fall into distressed categories and ultimately horrifying results #cps

meta.text: Thomas- Failing children fall into distressed categories and ultimately horrifying results #cps

quote.text: Thomas- Former AUSL staff/principal at Stagg so they know the AUSL principles. #cps

meta.text: Thomas- Former AUSL staff/principal at Stagg so they know the AUSL principles. #cps

quote.text: Thomas talking about data showing some turnaround schools that have lower scores than Stagg. "Why aren't we supporting Stagg" #cps

meta.text: Thomas talking about data showing some turnaround schools that have lower scores than Stagg. "Why aren't we supporting Stagg" #cps

quote.text: Thomas- The Morton school that is used as an AUSL example is still on probation #cps

meta.text: Thomas- The Morton school that is used as an AUSL example is still on probation #cps

quote.text: @shua123 <3 Ald. Thomas

meta.text: @shua123 <3 Ald. Thomas

quote.text: This is a great presentation by Alderman Thomas, but if she doesn't stop soon, the public won't have enough time to speak #cps

meta.text: This is a great presentation by Alderman Thomas, but if she doesn't stop soon, the public won't have enough time to speak #cps

quote.text: And as I say that, she moves to her conclusion #cps

meta.text: And as I say that, she moves to her conclusion #cps

data.text: Since she is an Alderman, she was allowed more than the standard 2 minutes.

quote.text: Alderman Thomas submits a written statement for the record #cps

meta.text: Alderman Thomas submits a written statement for the record #cps

quote.text: As an alternative to disruptive clapping, the crowd has adopted what I can best describe as jazz hands. #cps

meta.text: As an alternative to disruptive clapping, the crowd has adopted what I can best describe as jazz hands. #cps

quote.text: Ruth miller- principal of Stagg. 1st principal I have seen speak. #cps

meta.text: Ruth miller- principal of Stagg. 1st principal I have seen speak. #cps

quote.text: @shua123 -- That takes some guts.

meta.text: @shua123 -- That takes some guts.

quote.text: Miller going over her qualifications & background including current Doctorate program. 28 years in CPS program. #cps

meta.text: Miller going over her qualifications & background including current Doctorate program. 28 years in CPS program. #cps

quote.text: Miller - We have made consistent improvement in climate & culture, academic achievement, community/parent involvement #cps

meta.text: Miller - We have made consistent improvement in climate & culture, academic achievement, community/parent involvement #cps

quote.text: Miller- reduced the # of misconducts by 60% #cps

meta.text: Miller- reduced the # of misconducts by 60% #cps

quote.text: Miller- Hired highly qualified teachers from variety of backgrounds #cps

meta.text: Miller- Hired highly qualified teachers from variety of backgrounds #cps

quote.text: Miller- give the current staff a chance. Why should we turnaround a school that promotes a safe learning environment #cps

meta.text: Miller- give the current staff a chance. Why should we turnaround a school that promotes a safe learning environment #cps

quote.text: Kimberly Henderson- Current Assistant principal at Stagg. Hired at AUSL, was assistant principal. believes in turnaround schools #cps

meta.text: Kimberly Henderson- Current Assistant principal at Stagg. Hired at AUSL, was assistant principal. believes in turnaround schools #cps

quote.text: Henderson- believes in turnaround schools for lowest performing but Stagg is not one of the lowest #cps

meta.text: Henderson- believes in turnaround schools for lowest performing but Stagg is not one of the lowest #cps

quote.text: Henderson has a binder of data to submit. "We have lots more data to share" #cps

meta.text: Henderson has a binder of data to submit. "We have lots more data to share" #cps

quote.text: Henderson- AUSL cannot turnaround all the schools in CPS. AUSL does not have the manpower #cps

meta.text: Henderson- AUSL cannot turnaround all the schools in CPS. AUSL does not have the manpower #cps

quote.text: Henderson- Stagg has a model that should be replicated. She can apply what she learned from AUSL to non-AUSL school, share knowledge #cps

meta.text: Henderson- Stagg has a model that should be replicated. She can apply what she learned from AUSL to non-AUSL school, share knowledge #cps

quote.text: Henderson- 3 AUSL teachers as well.Bring AUSL experience without turning around school #cps

meta.text: Henderson- 3 AUSL teachers as well.Bring AUSL experience without turning around school #cps

quote.text: Henderson- new scantron data (last 2 weeks) says 60% projected to meet ISAT standards. 75% in math #cps

meta.text: Henderson- new scantron data (last 2 weeks) says 60% projected to meet ISAT standards. 75% in math #cps

quote.text: Henderson- our model is working and CPS should look at our example of taking AUSL admin. and placing them in CPS non-turnaroun school #cps

meta.text: Henderson- our model is working and CPS should look at our example of taking AUSL admin. and placing them in CPS non-turnaroun school #cps

quote.text: Next parent - Stagg provided special ed that previous school didn't have. Travel 15 miles to bring children to Stagg #cps

meta.text: Next parent - Stagg provided special ed that previous school didn't have. Travel 15 miles to bring children to Stagg #cps

quote.text: Letter from 7 year old- "Don't turn our school around like a tornado" #cps

meta.text: Letter from 7 year old- "Don't turn our school around like a tornado" #cps

quote.text: Former Stagg student - Teachers helped me to be the best person I am today. they motivated me. #cps

meta.text: Former Stagg student - Teachers helped me to be the best person I am today. they motivated me. #cps

quote.text: student continued- If it wasn't for Stagg teachers, I would probably be in jail. I am very proud I went to Stagg #cps

meta.text: student continued- If it wasn't for Stagg teachers, I would probably be in jail. I am very proud I went to Stagg #cps

quote.text: Stagg students now #cps

meta.text: Stagg students now #cps

quote.text: Student B- 5th grader at Stagg- "I've learned a lot and improved a lot. I've improved on the scantron & ISAT" #cps

meta.text: Student B- 5th grader at Stagg- "I've learned a lot and improved a lot. I've improved on the scantron & ISAT" #cps

quote.text: Student B- My teachers are caring and have respect for our feelings #cps

meta.text: Student B- My teachers are caring and have respect for our feelings #cps

quote.text: Student C- 5th grader- Teachers are not bad at all. Teacher pushes students to get great grades #cps

meta.text: Student C- 5th grader- Teachers are not bad at all. Teacher pushes students to get great grades #cps

quote.text: Student C- I don't think you should turn Stagg school around. #cps

meta.text: Student C- I don't think you should turn Stagg school around. #cps

quote.text: Vivian Wallace- NCLB chairperson, LSC member. worker at Stagg since 2001. #cps

meta.text: Vivian Wallace- NCLB chairperson, LSC member. worker at Stagg since 2001. #cps

quote.text: Vivian Wallace- Representing those in community that could not attend meeting due to time and location #cps

meta.text: Vivian Wallace- Representing those in community that could not attend meeting due to time and location #cps

quote.text: Wallace- Mentions programs, in school behavior programs, Montessori, etc. Add resources & maybe improvement plan, not turnaround #cps

meta.text: Wallace- Mentions programs, in school behavior programs, Montessori, etc. Add resources & maybe improvement plan, not turnaround #cps

quote.text: Michele Thompson- Teachers aide at Stagg. character education person. at stagg since 1995 #cps

meta.text: Michele Thompson- Teachers aide at Stagg. character education person. at stagg since 1995 #cps

quote.text: Thompson- need to give teachers a chance to prove. If they had more money & resources they could improve. No turnaround #cps

meta.text: Thompson- need to give teachers a chance to prove. If they had more money & resources they could improve. No turnaround #cps

quote.text: Sherry Williams- K teacher, LSC teacher rep, CTU delegate #cps

meta.text: Sherry Williams- K teacher, LSC teacher rep, CTU delegate #cps

quote.text: Williams- Pride points that are entered into monthly raffle, prizes for highest monthly attendance. #cps

meta.text: Williams- Pride points that are entered into monthly raffle, prizes for highest monthly attendance. #cps

quote.text: Williams- Mentor for students with behavior issues & sets daily goals; vast after school program including sports #cps

meta.text: Williams- Mentor for students with behavior issues & sets daily goals; vast after school program including sports #cps

quote.text: OH asks about how Stagg decreases out of school suspensions #cps

meta.text: OH asks about how Stagg decreases out of school suspensions #cps

quote.text: Williams- Students bused to nearby schools for after school programs. Received grant for more after school & offer parent GED program #cps

meta.text: Williams- Students bused to nearby schools for after school programs. Received grant for more after school & offer parent GED program #cps

quote.text: Williams- Bi-weekly assessments based on scantron results #cps

meta.text: Williams- Bi-weekly assessments based on scantron results #cps

quote.text: Asiaha Butler- Englewood Community Action Council co-chair #cps

meta.text: Asiaha Butler- Englewood Community Action Council co-chair #cps

quote.text: Butler- More of a neutral party but what I have seen so far they are doing good and I can see them improving in coming years. #cps

meta.text: Butler- More of a neutral party but what I have seen so far they are doing good and I can see them improving in coming years. #cps

quote.text: Matthew Luskin - @ctulocal1 organizer- Offering findings of state legislature task force that found CPS board not compliant #cps

meta.text: Matthew Luskin - @ctulocal1 organizer- Offering findings of state legislature task force that found CPS board not compliant #cps

quote.text: Luskin- Nothing in board's presentation captures safety issues. Guggenheim would be closing a block a way #cps

meta.text: Luskin- Nothing in board's presentation captures safety issues. Guggenheim would be closing a block a way #cps

quote.text: Luskin- New charter school opened recently that pointed to Stagg's Montessori program. No plan to keep in place #cps

meta.text: Luskin- New charter school opened recently that pointed to Stagg's Montessori program. No plan to keep in place #cps

quote.text: Luskin- Nothing by CPS or AUSL about reduction of Af. American teachers in turnaround; nothing in report about art #cps

meta.text: Luskin- Nothing by CPS or AUSL about reduction of Af. American teachers in turnaround; nothing in report about art #cps

quote.text: Luskin talking about seeing the inspiring art at Stagg done through art program #cps

meta.text: Luskin talking about seeing the inspiring art at Stagg done through art program #cps

quote.text: My comment to @ctuilocal1, show us (the public) the art. Show us the benefits of montessori. Show us the safety data concerns #cps

meta.text: My comment to @ctuilocal1, show us (the public) the art. Show us the benefits of montessori. Show us the safety data concerns #cps

quote.text: Erika Jenkins- parent of 3- If our school could receive more resources; The Beacon program; Those types of resources help #cps

meta.text: Erika Jenkins- parent of 3- If our school could receive more resources; The Beacon program; Those types of resources help #cps

quote.text: Jenkins- If we had more resources to maintain programs like that for students that may not have a warm meal to eat #cps

meta.text: Jenkins- If we had more resources to maintain programs like that for students that may not have a warm meal to eat #cps

quote.text: Jenkins- The staff, from the principal to the janitor are doing a great job. #cps

meta.text: Jenkins- The staff, from the principal to the janitor are doing a great job. #cps

quote.text: Jenkins- Students hear words of encouragement at school regardless of home situation #cps

meta.text: Jenkins- Students hear words of encouragement at school regardless of home situation #cps

quote.text: Willie Kennedy- neutral, or a parent. - "Who paid you?:" screams from the crowd #cps

meta.text: Willie Kennedy- neutral, or a parent. - "Who paid you?:" screams from the crowd #cps

quote.text: Kennedy- You have heard from the parents at Stagg school and I hope you make the right decision #cps

meta.text: Kennedy- You have heard from the parents at Stagg school and I hope you make the right decision #cps

quote.text: Hannah Richardson- Primary Montessori teacher at Stagg; Reconsider & give students and staff chance #cps

meta.text: Hannah Richardson- Primary Montessori teacher at Stagg; Reconsider & give students and staff chance #cps

quote.text: Richardson- teaches students for 3 years (age 3-6). Everything is tailored to individual needs and interests #cps

meta.text: Richardson- teaches students for 3 years (age 3-6). Everything is tailored to individual needs and interests #cps

quote.text: Richardson- Children are performing well. 10 years of experience all across country. #cps

meta.text: Richardson- Children are performing well. 10 years of experience all across country. #cps

quote.text: Richardson- Our principal wants to expand Montessori in our school which can't happen if we are turned around #cps

meta.text: Richardson- Our principal wants to expand Montessori in our school which can't happen if we are turned around #cps

quote.text: OH offered to give Richardson extra time and said afterward "Keep up the good work." #cps

meta.text: OH offered to give Richardson extra time and said afterward "Keep up the good work." #cps

quote.text: Missed name of parent- Turning around the school may seem like a great idea now but as a parent I think it would be a terrible idea #cps

meta.text: Missed name of parent- Turning around the school may seem like a great idea now but as a parent I think it would be a terrible idea #cps

quote.text: parent- Our school is always open to the community. I am proud to say my son is a student at Stagg. #cps

meta.text: parent- Our school is always open to the community. I am proud to say my son is a student at Stagg. #cps

quote.text: Nancy Jo Roberts- HeadStart teacher at Stagg- Taught generations of families at Stagg. Have had past students come back to see teachers #cps

meta.text: Nancy Jo Roberts- HeadStart teacher at Stagg- Taught generations of families at Stagg. Have had past students come back to see teachers #cps

quote.text: If u care about real #edreform u gotta weigh in against travesty in Chi #cps. Turnaround vs. huge parent opposition. @shua123 live tweeting.

meta.text: If u care about real #edreform u gotta weigh in against travesty in Chi #cps. Turnaround vs. huge parent opposition. @shua123 live tweeting.

quote.text: Roberts- Turnaround is not just changing faculty and staff, it is breaking up a family #cps

meta.text: Roberts- Turnaround is not just changing faculty and staff, it is breaking up a family #cps

quote.text: Roberts- worked with 5 administrations at Stagg. No better teachers or administrators than Stagg's #cps

meta.text: Roberts- worked with 5 administrations at Stagg. No better teachers or administrators than Stagg's #cps

quote.text: Student D- Please don't turnaround my school, I have been there since I was a baby. We work hard for a good education #cps

meta.text: Student D- Please don't turnaround my school, I have been there since I was a baby. We work hard for a good education #cps

quote.text: Student D- These teachers are important in our lives. Don't change our school. #cps

meta.text: Student D- These teachers are important in our lives. Don't change our school. #cps

quote.text: Student E fell asleep #cps

meta.text: Student E fell asleep #cps

quote.text: Why 8pm-10pm hearings for elem school turnaround might not be a great idea: RT @shua123 Student E fell asleep #cps

meta.text: Why 8pm-10pm hearings for elem school turnaround might not be a great idea: RT @shua123 Student E fell asleep #cps

quote.text: Student F- Montessori 2nd grade stnt- I dont want the school to turn around because the activities. I don't want a different principal #cps

meta.text: Student F- Montessori 2nd grade stnt- I dont want the school to turn around because the activities. I don't want a different principal #cps

quote.text: Oh, F was really E. Now Student F #cps

meta.text: Oh, F was really E. Now Student F #cps

quote.text: Student F- 6 year old Montessori student #cps

meta.text: Student F- 6 year old Montessori student #cps

quote.text: Adrienne Adams- parent of 5 children, 2 at Stagg. speaking against turnaround. specifically against Montessori #cps

meta.text: Adrienne Adams- parent of 5 children, 2 at Stagg. speaking against turnaround. specifically against Montessori #cps

quote.text: Adams- Stagg Montessori program was "an answer to a prayer" #cps

meta.text: Adams- Stagg Montessori program was "an answer to a prayer" #cps

quote.text: Adams- 6 year old is doing things my 11 year old isn't doing yet. #cps

meta.text: Adams- 6 year old is doing things my 11 year old isn't doing yet. #cps

quote.text: Adams- Have older kids at Magnet school. No difference in warmth of teachers in Stagg vs magnet #cps

meta.text: Adams- Have older kids at Magnet school. No difference in warmth of teachers in Stagg vs magnet #cps

quote.text: Adams- Just give more resources to the teachers that are already working so hard #cps

meta.text: Adams- Just give more resources to the teachers that are already working so hard #cps

quote.text: Adams was the last. Started at 8:04, end at 10:04. Less than halfway through stack of speakers #cps

meta.text: Adams was the last. Started at 8:04, end at 10:04. Less than halfway through stack of speakers #cps

quote.text: Hearing Officer Bates asking the Stagg staff (principal etc) and Alderman to submit written statements for record #cps

meta.text: Hearing Officer Bates asking the Stagg staff (principal etc) and Alderman to submit written statements for record #cps

quote.text: It is over. #cps

meta.text: It is over. #cps
